title: Policy Creation and Versioning
description: Verify that a Policy Author can create a new policy using the authoring interface, save drafts, submit for review, and create new versions of existing policies.

steps.description: Login as a Policy Author.
Navigate to the Policy Authoring Interface.
Create a new policy with all required fields completed and rich text content.
Save the policy as a draft.
Verify the draft is saved correctly and visible in draft list.
Submit the draft for review and approval workflow.
Confirm the policy status changes to 'Under Review' and notifications are sent appropriately.
After approval, update the policy to create a new version.
Validate that the new version is linked correctly and version history is updated.

title: Policy Browsing and Search in Policy Hub
description: Verify that users can browse, filter, and search policies in the Policy Hub with accurate results and performance within SLAs.

steps.description: Login as an Employee.
Navigate to the Policy Hub.
Apply various filters such as policy type, status, and department.
Perform keyword and AI-enhanced searches for policies.
Verify that search results are relevant, correctly filtered, and displayed within 2 seconds.
Open a policy detail from search results.
Confirm that the policy details, version history, and related policies are displayed correctly.

title: Multi-role Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that multi-role access controls restrict policy, user, and system data visibility according to role permissions.

steps.description: Login as a Policy Author.
Confirm access to create, edit, and submit policies only.
Login as an HR Manager.
Verify access to approve policies and manage users and exemptions but no authoring permissions.
Login as Compliance Officer.
Confirm read access to compliance dashboards and audit reports, no edit permissions on policy content.
Attempt to access unauthorized features and verify access is denied.

title: Policy Acknowledgement Workflow with Digital Signatures and Audit Logs
description: Ensure employees receive assigned policies, acknowledge them with digital signatures, and audit logs are created and immutable.

steps.description: Login as an Employee with assigned policies.
Access 'My Policies' dashboard and open an assigned policy.
Acknowledge the policy with digital signature.
Verify acknowledgement status updates correctly on dashboard.
Confirm audit log entry is generated with timestamp and signature, and it cannot be altered.
Attempt to submit duplicate acknowledgements and verify system handles duplicates properly.

title: Policy Exemption Request and Approval Workflow
description: Validate the workflow for users requesting policy exemptions, reviews by managers and compliance officers, and final approval with compensating controls tracking.

steps.description: Login as an Employee and request exemption for a policy.
Verify exemption request submission with reason and attachments is successful.
Login as HR Manager and review exemption requests.
Approve the exemption with compensating controls notes.
Confirm approval status updates and notifications are sent accordingly.
Verify audit logs record exemption request and approval history immutably.

title: Comprehension Quiz Creation and Assignment
description: Test creation of policy comprehension quizzes with various question types, assigning quizzes to users, and enforcing retake limitations.

steps.description: Login as a Policy Author or Admin.
Create a new comprehension quiz with multiple question types (multiple choice, true/false, short answer).
Assign the quiz to a group of users or specific policies.
Verify quiz is visible and accessible only to assigned users.
Attempt retake before allowed interval and ensure system restricts retake attempt.

title: Comprehension Quiz Taking and Analytics
description: Validate that assigned users can take quizzes, receive immediate feedback, and the system records analytics correctly including scores and retake history.

steps.description: Login as an Employee assigned a quiz.
Complete the quiz entering answers to all question types.
Verify immediate feedback on correct/incorrect answers is displayed.
Confirm quiz score, pass/fail status, and completion date are recorded accurately.
Review analytics dashboards as Admin to verify quiz completion metrics.

title: Compliance Analytics and Reporting Accuracy
description: Ensure real-time dashboards provide accurate compliance and engagement metrics, predictive insights, and reports export correctly to Excel, PDF, and PowerPoint formats.

steps.description: Login as HR Manager or Compliance Officer.
Access the Advanced Analytics dashboards.
Verify metrics such as compliance scores, overdue acknowledgements, and engagement rates reflect underlying data accurately.
Generate audit and compliance reports.
Confirm reports export correctly to Excel, PDF, and PowerPoint with valid and complete content.
Test predictive analytics and assess that generated insights are plausible based on dataset.

title: Automated Notifications and Escalation Workflows
description: Validate that email and Microsoft Teams alerts, reminders, and escalations are triggered on policy assignments, overdue acknowledgements, and exemption workflow status changes.

steps.description: Trigger policy distribution to a user or group.
Verify email and Teams notifications are sent correctly.
Simulate overdue acknowledgement scenario.
Check that reminder notifications and escalations are sent per configured rules.
Change status of exemption request and verify notification to stakeholders.

title: Performance and Mobile Responsiveness
description: Verify that key pages including Policy Hub, My Policies dashboard, and Admin Dashboard load within 2 seconds, and UI adjusts correctly on various mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access Policy Hub on desktop.
Measure page load time is under 2 seconds.
Open My Policies dashboard on mobile device or emulator.
Verify correct layout, no content overflow, navigation works correctly.
Navigate Admin Dashboard on tablet screen size.
Confirm UI elements display properly without layout breakages.

title: Security Features: Encrypted Storage and Multi-factor Authentication
description: Validate that sensitive data is encrypted at rest and in transit, and multi-factor authentication prompts occur appropriately during login.

steps.description: Attempt login as a user with MFA enabled.
Verify system prompts for second authentication factor after password entry.
Inspect data storage to confirm encryption of policy documents and audit trails.
Confirm data transmissions use secure protocols (HTTPS/TLS).
Attempt to access data without appropriate permissions.
Verify that unauthorized data access is blocked.

title: Integration with Microsoft 365 and DWx Suite
description: Verify seamless integration points including Azure AD authentication, SharePoint storage of policies, Microsoft Graph for user and group data, and Power Automate workflows triggering.

steps.description: Login using Azure AD credentials.
Confirm that user is authenticated and roles/groups are resolved correctly from Microsoft Graph.
Create or update a policy and verify it is stored correctly in SharePoint Online document library.
Check file metadata and permissions reflect policy authoring actions.
Trigger a configured Power Automate workflow on policy approval.
Verify the workflow executes and notifications or follow-up actions complete successfully.

title: Policy Pack Management
description: Validate the grouping of related policies into policy packs, including creation, modification, distribution, and removal of packs.

steps.description: Login as Policy Administrator.
Create a new Policy Pack by selecting multiple existing policies.
Verify policy pack is created with correct policies grouped.
Modify the policy pack by adding/removing policies.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in distribution targets.
Distribute the policy pack to target users/groups.
Verify users receive all policies in the policy pack and acknowledgement tracking works per policy.

title: Policy Lifecycle Transitions
description: Validate that policies move correctly through lifecycle stages: draft, under review, approved, distributed, archived, with proper triggers and status changes.

steps.description: Create a new policy, save as draft.
Validate status is 'Draft'.
Submit policy for review.
Validate status changes to 'Under Review'.
Approve the policy.
Confirm status changes to 'Approved' and distribution process initiates.
Distribute policy to users.
Check status is 'Distributed'.
Archive a policy and ensure it is no longer active but remains accessible for audit.
Verify archived policies appear in archive section with correct metadata.
